source: Parazitii intestinali, cum ar fi viermii rotunzi, teniile si Giardia, pot cauza disconfort abdominal, diaree, constipatie si alte probleme digestive.
target: Intestinal parasites, such as roundworms, tapeworms, and Giardia, can cause abdominal discomfort, diarrhea, constipation, and other digestive problems.
